name: ENGIE Smart
description:
Get more out of your digital meter with the ENGIE Smart app. You have insight into your consumption and costs at a glance, anytime and anywhere. If you have solar panels, you know how much you inject and what it yields.

 - You are always aware of your electricity and gas consumption
 - You always know whether your consumption is higher or lower than foreseen in your advance
 - You will receive a notification when your advance is no longer adjusted to your actual consumption with a proposal to change it immediately
